about_the_game:
You are Camus Chen. Yesterday you received a video mail from your friend Lu. He thinks you have too few friends and recommends you a popular game:
『This is a battle game but many people use it as a chat room』
Lu told you so.

You decided to join your friends in this game to meet new opponents and chat with them while playing against them. Lu wants you to chill.

But what you didn't expect is that some of your opponents will have a connection to your life in the future. One of them will even learn the great secret behind you and your friends...

In This Game:

  • Stories - Meet and get to know different strangers
  • Arcade - Use strategy to defeat your opponent
  • Sandbox - Camus Chen, do you still remember those plastic soldiers we played with when we were kids?

You Will Experience:

  • Play as a young man with a mysterious background who likes chatting with friends online.
  • Complete your story map! Camus Chen will record the story of his acquaintances in his memo.
  • Get to know the lives of opponents from all over the world.
  • Or simply play a battlefield simulator.
  • Please pour yourself a glass of wine, a cup of tea, or any drink that can make you relax, and enjoy the stories.

The story mode will be released in two parts. The first part will be released in early 2023, and the second half will be a free update.

Contact:
laoluproductions@outlook.com

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12.2.1
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12.2.1
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Traveler's Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvdia GTX1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel I7
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvdia GTX1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Your name is Camus Chen. Because of a recommendation from your friend Lu, you downloaded a battle simulator game famous for its sociability. You meet strangers and learn about their lives by simply chatting with them online. Unexpectedly, you will reveal a big secret of yourself...
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
